job.title: Software Engineer(gameplay programming)
job.description: ltstronggtGaming Industry OpportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThis Jobot Job is hosted by Angel MaciasltbrgtltbrgtAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumeltbrgtltbrgtSalary 80000  110000 per yearltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtA Bit About UsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTitle Gameplay Software EngineerltbrgtltbrgtLocation Chicago Illinois Possible RemoteltbrgtltbrgtBased in the suburbs of Chicago we are a cutting edge gaming and technology company growing at a tremendous pace We are currently looking for Software Engineers with CC skills to join our team If you are an Software Engineer in the greater Chicago Illinois market looking to disrupt the entertainment industry apply today or send your resume directly to angelmaciasjobotcomltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhy join usltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtDo you want to be part of the gaming and entertainment industry with a highly reputable companyltbrgtltulgtltligt Competitive Base Salaryltligtltligt Flexible Work Schedulesltligtltligt Accelerated Career GrowthltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtJob DetailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtLooking for strong Software Engineers with backgrounds in gameplay programmingltbrgtltulgtltligt 10 years CC experience ltligtltligt Game development and programmingltligtltligt Video game industry experience ltligtltligt 3D studio MAXltligtltligt WindowsLinuxltbrgtltligtltulgtInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button
